title: Synergistic Farming
text: Precision ag telemetry. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We assess soil nutrients for fertilization plans. In winter we protect equipment from freezing. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. We start work before sunrise during harvest. We interpret telemetry from precision agriculture systems. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We record yields and monitor feed intake. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. We design protocols for herd health management.
